As Design Editor for the University of Washington's newspaper The Daily, I layout and design each page for our weekly production using the Adobe Suite programs. I also handle the hiring and directing of our designers that help layout the issue. I have compiled here several clippings from our various issues including our regular weekly produciton, Game Daily, and Pacific Wave magazine. All Design work below is done by myself
